content: this alpine baby bonnet is an easy and cute baby hat that quick to make it textured and so cosy this baby bonnet pattern contains instructions for sizes 0-6 months and 6-12 months it is beginner friendly as it makes use of simple crochet stitches like double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch and half_double_crochet this pattern has a video tutorial on youtube available via the link below https //youtu be/t5mqwghhwxm si=zrth_es-futxkgiw materials dk weight yarn 5 5 mm crochet hook stitch markers this pattern has been thoroughly tested **buy more save more no codes needed get 10% discount when you purchase 2 patterns at once get 15% discount when you purchase 3 patterns at once get 20% discount when you purchase 4 patterns at once get 25% discount when you purchase 5 patterns at once get 40% discount when you purchase 10 or more patterns at once** this is a pdf pattern and not a finished product it is a copyright issue of toyslab creations you are free to sell whatever you make from this pattern but you can t sell share or modify part or all of the pattern if you have any questions about the pattern contact me via email happy crocheting
